ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectFirm KPMG LLP of Montréal, Quebec, as Auditor of the Business development Bank of Canada ** Appointment **
PrecisOrder appointing the firm KPMG LLP of Montréal, Quebec, as AUDITOR of the Business Development Bank of Canada for the fiscal year commencing April 1, 2020.
